glosses: A suffix creating verbs from nouns.

examples.text: sabah (“morning”) + -la → sabahlamak (“to stay awake till morning, spend a night”)

glosses: A suffix added to foreign verbs to create verb stems and allow for conjugation.

examples.text: favlamak ("to fave"), likelamak ("to like"), ghostlamak ("to ghost"), winlemek ("to win"), pushlamak ("to push"), burstlemek ("to burst"), etc.
